snippet: The Health and Human Services Department cited outdated equipment and technology, lack of resources, and difficulty attracting and keeping skilled staff....
abstract: Heath and Human Services Dept report faults outdated equipment, lack of resources and difficultly attracting and keeping skilled staff for substandard care at hospitals serving Native Americans; issue has concerned federal government for nearly century; critics say Indian Health Service, agency responsible for providing care to tribal members, has faced challenges for decades.
lead_paragraph: The Health and Human Services Department cited outdated equipment and technology, lack of resources, and difficulty attracting and keeping skilled staff.

headline.main: Why Care at Native American Hospitals Is Often Substandard
headline.print_headline: Reports Cite Flaws at Native American Hospitals
